gov.cms.qrda.schematron.validate

Class MergeProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.cms.qrda.schematron.validate.MergeProperties
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MergeInstructions

    public class MergeProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the values found in a merge instructions xml file.
    Author:
    Dan Donahue, ESAC Inc.

      • headerFormat

        protected java.lang.String headerFormat
        A format string used as the first parameter in a String.format command. The format string must accommodate four text strings: title, version, header and date, in that order.

      • errorsHeader

        protected java.lang.String errorsHeader

      • warningsHeader

        protected java.lang.String warningsHeader

      • validator

      • mergeReportFilename

        protected java.lang.String mergeReportFilename

      • vocabFilename

        protected java.lang.String vocabFilename

      • useSystemOut

        protected boolean useSystemOut
        If this value is true, then all log information is written to System.out as well as the merge report file (if any). This value is false by default. If no merge report filename is present in the merge instructions file, then useSystemOut is set to true.

      • XSD_FILENAME

        public static final java.lang.String XSD_FILENAME
        The name of an XSD file used to validate the final merged schematron file. The value is hard-coded to be Schema/CDA/infrastructure/cda/CDA_SDTC.xsd relative to the deployment directory of the merge application. Change the XSD file by over-writing the new file to the existing file in above location.

      • addResult

        public void addResult(java.lang.String line)
        Adds the given string to the end of the current results list If the useSystemOut value in this object is true, then the string is also printed to System.out
        Parameters:
        line - the string to add to the results list
        See Also:
        useSystemOut
